fursuits.title: Fursuits
fursuits.description: Here you can find thousands of existing fursuits. Use any of the many available filters to narrow your search and find that fursuit you're looking for !

makers.title: Makers
makers.description: This is a list of fursuit makers in the fandom. You can filter them by country, name, and even by commission status if the studio owner has provided this data !

landing.welcomeDescription1: Scritch is a brand new website dedicated to hosting Fursuit Convention Media, then providing tag notifications to Fursuit Owners through its comprehensive network of Makers, Suits, and Conventions past and present.
landing.welcomeDescription2: We are bringing together Suiters, Photographers, and Makers.{br}This is THE place to go for everything Fursuit !
